articles.description: Terry Venables was "the best English coach we've had", says Gary Lineker as he leads tributes to the former England boss.
articles.title: Venables the best English coach we've had - Lineker

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text commentary as Australia take on Italy in the Davis Cup final from Malaga, Spain.
articles.title: Davis Cup Final: Australia v Italy - watch & text

articles.description: Tributes to Terry Venables before text and radio commentary as Tottenham face Aston Villa and Everton host Manchester United in the Premier League.
articles.title: Tributes to Venables

articles.description: Live text commentary as Real Madrid aim to go back to the top of the La Liga table at Cadiz.
articles.title: Real Madrid aim to go back to top of table at Cadiz

articles.description: Alejandro Garnacho smashes in a sensational goal-of-the season contender as Manchester United beat Everton in the Toffees' first game since their 10-point deduction.
articles.title: Garnacho wonder goal helps Man Utd to win at Everton

articles.description: Aston Villa come from behind to beat Tottenham Hotspur on the day they remember former player and manager Terry Venables.
articles.title: Villa fight back to win as Spurs remember Venables

articles.description: Watch live coverage as Bristol City take on Manchester United, plus follow radio and text coverage of five other games in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Build-up to Bristol City v Man Utd and five other matches

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen ends the most dominant season in Formula 1 history with victory in the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, his 19th win in 22 races.
articles.title: Verstappen wins F1 season finale in Abu Dhabi

articles.description: Former England manager Terry Venables dies at the age of 80 after a long illness.
articles.title: Former England manager Venables dies

articles.description: Katie Taylor says beating Chantelle Cameron to become a two-weight undisputed champion was the best night of her career.
articles.title: 'Great to prove people wrong - I'm back on top again'
